title: Ricall Music Logo Sans Serif
content:
Can anybody ID the simple sans serif underneath the VAG Rounded logo? Apologies for such a small image.

As always, thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200951im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ricall_3559.jpg)

 [‹ Blossa Glögg fonts ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200951/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41735 "Go to previous forum topic") [type ID 'speak up' UC ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200951/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41694 "Go to next forum topic")
author: malbright

comments.content: Wow. Great call. I never would’ve guessed that one. Thanks!
